Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteQueryBuilder.buildQuery(String[], String, String[], String, String, String, String)
    This method's signature is misleading since no SQL parameter substitution is carried out. The selection arguments parameter does not get used at all. To avoid confusion, call SQLiteQueryBuilder.buildQuery(String[], String, String, String, String, String) instead.
    org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteQueryBuilder.buildUnionSubQuery(String, String[], Set<String>, int, String, String, String[], String, String)
    This method's signature is misleading since no SQL parameter substitution is carried out. The selection arguments parameter does not get used at all. To avoid confusion, call SQLiteQueryBuilder.buildUnionSubQuery(java.lang.String, java.lang.String[], java.util.Set<java.lang.String>, int, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) instead.
    org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase.getSyncedTables()
    This method no longer serves any useful purpose and has been deprecated.
    org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteProgram.getUniqueId()
    This method is deprecated and must not be used.
    org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase.isDbLockedByOtherThreads()
    Always returns false. Do not use this method.
    org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase.markTableSyncable(String, String)
    This method no longer serves any useful purpose and has been deprecated.
    org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase.markTableSyncable(String, String, String)
    This method no longer serves any useful purpose and has been deprecated.
    org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteClosable.onAllReferencesReleasedFromContainer()
    Do not use.
    org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteClosable.releaseReferenceFromContainer()
    Do not use.
    org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase.setLockingEnabled(boolean)
    This method now does nothing. Do not use.
    org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase.yieldIfContended()
    if the db is locked more than once (becuase of nested transactions) then the lock will not be yielded. Use yieldIfContendedSafely instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteCursor(SQLiteDatabase, SQLiteCursorDriver, String, SQLiteQuery)
    use SQLiteCursor.SQLiteCursor(SQLiteCursorDriver, String, SQLiteQuery) instead
